name: Aero VXR Japan Test Pilot School
about: Aero VXR Japan Test Pilot School (JTPS) is the first test pilot school in Asia, established by specialists from various fields of the aerospace industry. Founded with the mission to enhance the aerospace industry by sharing their expertise, JTPS provides comprehensive education and training for flight test personnel, including operators and engineers. The school aims to raise the standards of aircraft and product development through rigorous training programs. With a commitment to giving back to society, JTPS is dedicated to nurturing skilled professionals who can contribute to the advancement of the aerospace sector. We look forward to collaborating with those who share our vision.
services:
["Type Certification FTP/FTE Initial Course
Type Certification FTP/FTE Recurrent Course
Fixed Wing FTP/FTE Short Course
Rotary Wing FTP/FTE Short Course
UAS Durability & Reliability Flight Test Course
Flight Test Safety & CRM Course 
Flight Test Project Management Course
Certificate Technique Course
Validation & Verification Safety Analysis Course"]
